document.cancellation_policy:
Terms and Conditions:


1. Entry: Valid ticket required; keep your wine glass throughout; entry between 11am – 10pm on 22nd - 23rd June.

2. Age Restrictions: Must be 21+ with valid ID for wine tastings.

3. Coupon Use: Each coupon valid for one tasting; non-transferable and non-redeemable for cash.

4. Conduct: Organizers may refuse entry or remove intoxicated/inappropriate attendees; drink responsibly.

5. Purchases: Additional wines and foods available at special prices; pay directly at counters.

6. Personal Belongings: Organizers not liable for loss, damage, or theft of personal items.

7. Cancellations and Refunds: Tickets non-refundable; full refund if event is canceled by organizers.

8. Photography and Media: Attendees consent to being photographed/filmed for promotional use.

9. Liability: Organizers not responsible for any injuries, accidents, or damages during the event.


By purchasing a ticket, attendees agree to these terms and conditions. Enjoy UnWined responsibly and let the future speak wine!

document.name: Unwine'd - Wine Festival
document.short_description:
Unwine'd by The Blend Community


Date: 22nd - 23rd June  

Timings: 11am – 10pm  

Venue: Pebbles, Bangalore   


Pouring Over the Details: 

Join us for Unwine'd, an exclusive wine festival in Bangalore that promises an immersive experience with multiple wines from across the globe. Delight in unique wine styles, regional offerings, and exquisite gourmet food pairings. This vibrant event is filled with themed activities, fun games, and live entertainment. Each attendee receives a beautiful wine glass souvenir and tasting coupons for all showcased wines. Engage with fellow wine enthusiasts, partake in educational workshops, and create unforgettable memories.


Highlights:

- Wine Tastings: Sample a diverse range of wines from local and international vineyards.

- Gourmet Pairings: Enjoy artisanal cheeses, chocolates, and gourmet foods.

- Live Music: Dance and relax to foot-tapping music.

- Workshops & Seminars: Learn from wine experts in engaging sessions.

- Artisanal Crafts: Explore handcrafted goods and wine accessories.

- Relaxation Zones: Unwind in scenic, comfortable seating areas.


Special Experiences:

- Grape Stomping: Channel your inner winemaker.

- DIY Wine Cocktails: Create custom wine-based drinks.

- Celebrity Chef's Tables: Enjoy culinary journeys with renowned chefs.

- Wine Blending: Craft your unique wine blend.


Join us at Unwine'd for a celebration of wine, culture, and community. Let the future speak wine!

document.name: Pasta Shop with Chef Goku

custom_questions.question: Number of vegetarians in the group?
Number of non-vegetarians in the group?

document.short_description:
Pasta Shop at The Conservatory!


Our glasshouse is transforming into a pasta shop for just two days. Experience pastas like never before from our menu featuring different types of handcrafted pastas curated by Chef Goku.


Chef Goku is a graduate of The Culinary Institute of America. He has worked at Dominique Ansel Bakery, Aureole, The Clock Tower, Junoon, Rezdora in New York, and Blackbird in Chicago. Currently, he conducts pop-ups and curated dinners in Chennai under the brand name Hygge By Chef Goku. Additionally, he oversees the pastry kitchens Chokolat Culture and Maison Indulgence.


MENU FOR THE PASTA SHOP


ANTIPASTI

 

Stracciatella Incontra Togo (Rs. 490)

Stracciatella Cheese, Togo Tomatoes, Heirloom Cherry Tomato Confit, Basil Oil, BalsamicReduction, Orange wedges, Arugula Served with Fett’ Unta.

 

Cacio E Pepe Wedge Salad  (Rs. 420)

Lettuce Wedge, Pecorino Dressing, Cracked Black Pepper.

 

Passatelli In Brodo (Rs. 420)

Parmesan Broth, Passatelli, White Truffle Oil, Cracked Black Pepper.

  

PASTA 

 

Tagliatelle Al Ragu (Rs. 770)

From Modena (Chef’s Special Short Rib Ragu).

 

Garganelli Al Ragu (Rs. 700) (V)

From Napoli (Chef’s Special Neapolitan Mushroom Ragu).

 

Strozzapreti (Rs. 665)

Creamy Tuscan Sauce with Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomato.

 

Anolini Di Parma (Rs. 770)

Traditional Lamb Meat Filling with Parmigiano Reggiano Sauce, Balsamic Reduction.

 

Ode To Rezdora (Rs. 700) (V)

Cappelletti Verde With Roasted, Sauteed Leeks and Black Mushroom Puree.

 

Agnolotti (Rs. 665) (V)

Agnolotti, Mixed Vegetables, Manchego, Brown Butter, Pumpkin.

 

Tortelli Di Parma (Rs. 665) (V)

Ricotta, Spinach, Herbs, Sun-Dried Tomato, Parmigiano Reggiano, Butter. 

 

Lobster Head Bisque  (Rs. 770)

Linguine, Lobster head Bisque sauce, Grilled Shrimp, Banana pepper.

 

Spring Gnocchi (Rs. 700) (V)

Peas, Asparagus Coins, Sage, Butter, Parmigiano Reggiano, Lemon Zest.

 

DOLCI 

 

Tipsy Tiramisu (Rs. 490)

Tipsy For two, better for one

 

Torta D’ Oliva (Rs. 560)

Olive Oil Cake with Stracciatella Ice Cream

 

Risotto Rice Pannacotta (Rs. 490)

Textures of Mango

document.booking_confirmation_message: Thanks for booking your ticket to "OTJF turns 5". We can't wait to celebrate with y'all!
document.cancellation_policy:
Ticket Purchase and Entry:

• Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.

• Entry is only permitted with a valid ticket and government-issued photo ID.

• The ticket holder must be of legal drinking age (21 years and above).


Event Timing:

• The event starts at 3 pm and ends at closing time.

• The venue has the right to charge a cover amount over and above the ticket amount for entry beyond 8 pm.


Conduct:

• The venue reserves the right to refuse entry to anyone found to be violating venue policies or behaving inappropriately.


Age Restrictions:

• The venue reserves the right to refuse entry to anyone based on their age restriction policy. 


Safety and Security:

• All guests may be subject to security checks upon entry.

• The venue is not responsible for the loss or theft of personal belongings.


Photography and Recording:

• The event may be photographed and recorded by the organizers for promotional purposes.


Alcohol Consumption:

• Alcohol will be served only to individuals who are 21 years or older.

• The venue reserves the right to refuse service to anyone deemed intoxicated or behaving inappropriately.


Cancellation and Changes:

• The organizers reserve the right to cancel or reschedule the event in case of unforeseen circumstances.

• In the event of cancellation, a full refund will be issued to ticket holders.


Liability:

• The organizers and the venue are not liable for any injuries, damages, or losses that occur during the event.


Miscellaneous:

• By purchasing a ticket, the ticket holder agrees to these terms and conditions.

• The terms and conditions are subject to change at the discretion of the organizers.

document.name: OTJF TURNS 5
document.short_description:
For "OTJF Turns 5”, we’re putting together a line-up of some of our favourite people who’ve contributed to unforgettable moments at our gigs. Join us this Sunday, 23rd June 2024, at Indiranagar Social, Bangalore, as we celebrate five incredible years of OTJF! Here’s what’s in store:


We start off with Spotlight: A Film showcase + OST Spotlight + Quiz of Empire Records (1995), a cult classic comedy-drama about a group of quirky employees at an independent record store navigating personal dilemmas and rebellious antics curated by the lovely Boo! Ya Watchin?.


Our music line-up includes DJ Uri, Digging in India, Maddwax, and Raka Ashok to celebrate at Indiranagar Social. 


Since it’s World Music Month, Digging In India and French DJ, Maddwax are digging deep into their crates to bring us the finest Indian disco, Arabic funk, Ghanian Highlife, Ethiopian jazz, Libyan Reggae and much more! And as our birthday also coincides with Juneteenth (June 19), we’re getting DJs Raka Ashok and Uri on the decks to close out the night with some of the best Hip-Hop in the game.


And finally, we’re also setting up a room full of wax from all over the world, along with some very special accessories and limited edition merch all at great prices! Come through, hang with us, and help us celebrate 5 years as India’s freshest record store!

default_section.label: What's included
default_section.text:
Entry to the event and all its dedicated rooms
Access to the film screening (Limited seats - so first come, first serve)

default_section.label: What's not
default_section.text:
Food and Beverages
Vinyl Records
Any other items on sale

document.name: A Modern European Breakfast by chef Clive Fernandes

custom_questions.question: Number of vegetarians in the group?
Number of non-vegetarians in the group?

document.short_description:
About the Meal


This is not your ordinary breakfast menu. It’s for diners looking to try something novel. Inspired by my time at Toronto’s famed Auberge du Pommier and paying homage to their chef patrons, this menu is crafted with carefully sourced ingredients and modern culinary techniques. Chef Clive Fernandes believes food should go beyond sustenance—it should be an experience. Keeping his core philosophy of simplicity and originality in mind, he crafts dishes that are both familiar yet progressive. What sets your brand apart: Oxalis brings modern European gastronomy to the city; no compromises, no shortcuts—just pure, unadulterated, and modern flavors. At Oxalis, we leave no stone unturned when it comes to ingredients used in each dish, delivering high-end artistic plates and an elevated dining experience.


MENU


NON VEGETARIAN


SAUCISSON EN BRIOCHE

Polish Pork Sausage, Brioche, Port


STEAK & EGGS

Coffee Tenderloin, Onsen Egg, Pomme Persillade (Gluten- free)


SAUMON

Fennel Cured Salmon, WHipped Horseradish Crème, Rye Toast


PASTRAMI DE CANARD

Smoked Muscovy Duck, Butternut Squash, Preserved Berries, Baguette


BACON PAIN PERDU

Spice Roasted. Plums, Creme Fraiche, Grape Molasses, Bacon Lardon, Brioche


QUICHE LORRAINE

Asparagus, Shucked Peas, Parmesan, Pork Ham, Confit Onion


VEGETARIAN


WILD & TAME MUSHROOM TARTINE

Mushroom Mascarpone Pâté, Purslane, Pickles


PANISSE

Torched Cauliflower, Root Vegetable Ketchup, Espelette Harissa, Chickpea Crumble (vegan, gluten- free)


POMME ALIGOT FOUGASSE

Braised Breadfruit & Jackfruit, Swiss Cheese Aligot, Espelette Puffed Quinoa & Potato


RIZ AU LAIT

Rice pudding, Pecan Pralines, Caramel Mousse (vegan, gluten-free)

document.name: Kids Playdate With Looroo Club | Farm Adventure
document.short_description:
Ticket Includes All Activities by The LooRoo Club for One Kid and One accompanying parent


Come along for an exciting farm adventure!


In squishy mud,

We sow some seeds,

Where spotted cows, bellow their tunes,

Wooly sheep graze on grass,

While little tractors go beep beep beep!


On Saturday, June 22nd 

Age 2 to 4 years 


Who doesn’t love farm animals?! We all have a favourite, don’t we? Our farm adventure is inspired by the book "What the Ladybird Heard" by Julia Donaldson. We’ll squelch our hands in a mushy farm, paint spotted ladybirds, and enjoy farm stories. We’ll plant crops like farmers and even make little tractors. It’s a messy, hands-on farm kind of day!


Terms and Conditions

document.name: The  Wonder Years with chefs Ralph & Picu

custom_questions.question: Number of Vegetarians in the Group
Number of Non- Vegetarians in the Group

document.short_description:
Join us for an unforgettable evening celebrating the rich culinary heritage of Goa with two best friends turned culinary stars, Chef Picu and Chef Ralph. These two chefs, now at the forefront of the Goan food scene, have been inseparable since childhood, sharing a bond forged in the vibrant streets of Panjim.


This special dinner menu is an ode to their enduring friendship and the city that has been its backdrop. The dishes showcase the European techniques they've mastered throughout their culinary journeys. The fusion of Portuguese and local influences that define Goan cuisine is beautifully reflected in every bite, each with a contemporary twist that only these talented chefs can create.


Throughout the evening, embark on a culinary journey that feels both modern and nostalgic. The menu draws inspiration from generations-old recipe books of the Gomes Pereira and Prazeres households, infusing the meal with the essence of Goa's rich history.


Experience the magic as these two friends take contemporary Goan cuisine in a new direction, delivering a heartwarming and memorable dining experience that pays tribute to their shared roots and innovative spirit.


Set Menu


NOTE: Seafood allergies & gluten can be accommodated


Non- Veg Menu

Coriander Chilli Lime/Goan Sausage Butter


Course 1:                                                     

OLMI                                                                    

Grilled morels & truffle.


Course 2:

GRILLED TIGER PRAWNS

Recheado seafood bisque


Course 3:

ROAST BEEF CROQUETTAS

Garlic paprika yoghurt


Course 4:

PAN ROASTED FISH

Kalchi kodi, turmeric mash, onion fennel salad


Course 5:

BEEF TENDERLION

Onion sauce, pepper jus, pomme frittes


COURSE 6:

PASTEIS DE NATA

Portuguese custard tart


Veg Menu

Coriander Chilli Lime


Course 1:                                                     

OLMI                                                                    

Grilled morels & truffle

GRILLED BROCCOLI

Garlic butter & dill yoghurt

JACKFRUIT CROQUETTAS

Garlic paprika yoghurt


Course 4:

GRILLED WHITE ASPARAGUS & PALM HEART

Kalchi kodi, turmeric mash, puffed brown rice


Course 5:

TAMBDI BHAJI LASAGNA

parmesan , goats cheese, caramelised walnuts


Course 6:

PASTEIS DE NATA

Portuguese custard tart

document.name: Mother of All Bake Sales
document.short_description:
Join us for the ultimate bake sale at Courtyard in Bangalore! We are thrilled to host an exceptional lineup of celebrated bakers from across India, each bringing their unique flavors and specialties. Meet and taste the creations of:


  1. Chef Ralph Prazeres from Padaria Prazeres, Goa
  2. Chef Dina Weber from Sapa Bakery, Mysore
  3. Chef Heena Punwani from Maska Bakery, Mumbai
  4. Chef Nida Ali from Market Lane, Chennai


Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to indulge in a variety of delectable baked goods, meet the bakers, and enjoy a day filled with scrumptious treats and delightful conversations. Whether you're a baking enthusiast or just love good food, the "Mother of All Bake Sales" is the place to be!

  • The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an event

document.name: ROSE FULL MOON YIN YOGA
document.short_description:
Join us for a Full Moon Yin Yoga & Dinner Delight at our wellness studio.


Yin Yoga during a full moon can be a deeply nurturing and grounding practice. Full moons are associated with a sense of completeness and transition, making it a great time for introspection and releasing what no longer serves you. 

Combining Yin Yoga with the energy of a rose (a.k.a strawberry) full moon can create a beautiful and intention-filled practice. The rose (a.k.a strawberry) full moon, also known as the June full moon, is associated with setting an intention to invite more sweetness and abundance into your life, both on and off the mat.


The yin yoga practice will then be followed by a light and nourishing supper. Embrace this opportunity to indulge in a dining experience that honors both your physical well-being and the peaceful harmony of the moonlit evening.


We hope to see you on the mat!

document.short_description:
Open-air screening with a three-course dinner & popcorn


About the movie:


In "Charlie's Angels" (2000), a high-energy action-comedy, three women—Natalie Cook (Cameron Diaz), Dylan Sanders (Drew Barrymore), and Alex Munday (Lucy Liu)—work as private investigators for the mysterious Charles Townsend, who communicates with them only through a speakerphone. Known collectively as Charlie's Angels, they use their intelligence, beauty, and a wide array of skills to tackle high-stakes missions.


3-Course Menu to be updated.

document.name: ANIMAL FLOW BRUNCH WITH SHERAL
document.short_description:
Gear up for an Animal flow session followed by a protein packed nourishing brunch 🤍


Who’s this session for? 

•Anyone curious about Animal flow and wants to learn this skill. 

•Anyone who wants to start their fitness journey or even for someone who has explored Animal flow before. 


Animal flow is a form of body weight training that explores multiplanar movements. It’s fun, challenging and going to help you understand your body better.

document.name: Full Moon Sound Bath
document.short_description:
Sound Bath & Painting: Manifesting Dreams Through Art and Meditation

Blending creative expression and sound healing to manifest desires. Visualize, draw, or write your dreams using colourful pens. Followed by a guided meditation and enhanced by the soothing tones of singing bowls. This deep relaxation and focus help you feel your dreams coming to life, fostering a powerful sense of connection to your goals.


Followed by a nourishing dinner spread at the exclusive cafe at The Studio by Copper + Cloves.


*No art experience or skill is needed- simply a willingness to be open and experimental

 

What to expect:

Centering and Grounding: Start with exercises to ground yourself and set your intentions

Creative Visualization: Visualize your dreams and desires

Guided Meditation: Transition into a calming meditation

Sound Bath: Be enveloped by the soothing tones of singing bowls, enhancing relaxation and focus.
